alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Greene; Jersey (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 09 at 8:40PM CDT until further notice by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Illinois River at Hardin. Illinois River at La Grange LD. Illinois River at Meredosia. Illinois River at Valley City. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Illinois River at Hardin. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Flood Stage. Lowland flooding of unprotected agricultural land begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 25.1 feet and rising. - Recent Activity...The river first reached flood stage late Friday night and has slowly risen since. - Forecast...The river is expected to hover near 25.1 feet for the next several days. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Wed Thu Illinois River Hardin 25.0 25.1 Sat 8 pm 25.1 25.1 25.1 25.1 25.1 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
